pr_title: CHANGELOG for optionally ignoring registry port in <server><id> in settings.xml

timeline.bodyText: This sounds like something that was required and is now optional? Maybe it should be something like Support for optional port in settings.xml <server><id> field.
timeline.author: TadCordle
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,6 +4,7 @@ All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
 ## [unreleased]
 
 ### Added
+- When giving registry credentials in `settings.xml`, specifying port in `<server><id>` is now optional. ([#2135](https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/issues/2135))

replies.bodyText: Actually, specifying port was required if an image reference had it. For example, if <to><image>my-server:1234/awe/some, it was required to have <server><id>my-server:1234</id>.  Now you can say just <server><id>my-server</id>. (<id>my-server:1234 will continue to work.)
replies.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Perhaps I should say ... is no longer required?
replies.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: In that case maybe this should go under "Changed" instead of "Added".
replies.author: TadCordle
